x.exceptions.CompanyDontExistException

    e.facade  

    • Uses of CompanyDontExistException in e.facade

      Methods in e.facade that throw CompanyDontExistException 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Company AdminFacade.getCompany(long id)
      this method is used to get an existing Company object from the DB, using its id.
      Company AdminFacade.getCompanyByName(java.lang.String name)
      this method is used to get an existing Company object from the DB, using its name.
      void AdminFacade.removeCompany(Company comp)
      this method receives a Company object, checks the DB to see if that company actually exists.
      void AdminFacade.updateCompany(Company newComp)
      this method receives a Company object, checks to ensure it's updateable attributes are valid, and then updates that company on the DB by retrieving the existing company, setting's its updatable attributes, and sending it to an update.
